title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your fascination with interpersonal communication draws your attention to the most subtle nuances of self-expression. Perhaps your words are enchanting or you find someone elses speech beguiling. Even if youre not normally attracted to the ornate language of poetry, you seem to gravitate in this artistic direction today. It doesnt matter whether youre talking or listening as long as youre interacting with others. If you have something important to say, do it now. The current alignment between your head and your heart infuses your conversations with the passion of your personal truth. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
